snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes Amazon Web Services expanding in Australia, YouTube preparing to renew its financing for some of its programming...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes Amazon Web Services expanding in Australia, YouTube preparing to renew its financing for some of its programming and police in Belize saying they want to talk to John McAfee of antivirus fame about a homicide.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Police Hunt McAfee, and YouTube Shows
